name: Air Fury
description:
The job of a test pilot is challenging yet important. Fly at high speeds above the water surface to uncover full potential of your aircraft!

Air Fury is a 2D racing game where you have to fly through multiple checkpoints on a fixed route within fixed period of time. Show a master class, squeezing the maximum out of the next prototype to see its maximum capabilities threading the needle!

Game Features:
- Retro Style
- Imitation of 3D
- Difficulty
